name: Moyashi
description:
A Game Created by:
Hannah Eliason - https://twitter.com/HannahEliasonXR
Koan Grierson - https://twitter.com/KoanGrierson
Brady J. Harty - https://twitter.com/BradyJHarty
Matthew Schreiner - https://twitter.com/Mattydude_96
and Noah

Welcome to Moyashi!

You play as this really cute bean sprout. It jumps, it runs around, it's great. give it a try.

But check this out! Moyashi's stats are randomly generated each time you start the game! Crazy right? One playthrough you could be a tiny lil bean running around collecting stuff and then another you could be a dump truck of a lad barreling through the course. Sounds pretty cool right?

You should give this a try, we had 2 days to make this and we're pretty tired.

Controls: 
WASD - move
Space - Jump

Moyashi also has controller support! :)
